existingEntities.name: Return
existingEntities.description: The components of an Transaction broken down by Product and Quantity, one per line item.

attributes.name: refund_amount
attributes.description: The amount refunded to the customer as a result of the return. May be different from the original ordered value.

existingEntities.name: SalesItem
existingEntities.description: This table contains Item level information for the transaction including Items bought, quantity in which they are purchased along with sales exluding tax and including tax. This also captures unit of meaesure for all the products bought. Promotions applicable at the item level as captured in this table.

attributes.name: item_level_discount_amount_retailer
attributes.description: Manufacturer's Discounts applied for the product purchased within this line Item. Essentially this could be difference between Full_Price and Total_Sales_Price_ex_tax

attributes.name: item_level_discount_amount_loyalty
attributes.description: Loyal customers may get Discounts applied for the product purchased within this line Item. Essentially this could be difference between Full_Price and Total_Sales_Price_ex_tax

attributes.name: additional_item_level_discount
attributes.description: Any adhoc discounts offered by Store manager or any on the fly discounts

existingEntities.name: SitesMaster
existingEntities.description: Details of stores and distribution center (such as address, city,state,country).

existingEntities.name: SalesHeader
existingEntities.description: This table contains header level information of Sales Transaction having date, customer, store, payment information, sales information along with transaction level discount if applicable.

existingEntities.name: ProductProperties
existingEntities.description: Product category hierarchy, PLU Code attributes are maintained in this table.
